contentheadline.headline: NAACP Image Award – Hall of Fame Award

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} The [[NAACP Image Award]] winners for the '''Hall of Fame Award''': <!-- If anybody can find more info on this, *please* add it. --> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Winner |- | 1983 | [[Lena Horne]] |- | 1983 | [[Ray Charles]] |- | 1984 | [[Ella Fitzgerald]]<br />[[Marian Anderson]]<br />[[Gordon Parks]]<br />[[Alberta Hunter]]<br />[[Paul Robeson]] |- | 1988 | [[Marvin Gaye]] |- | 1989 | [[Sammy Davis Jr.]]<br />[[Ossie Davis]] and [[Ruby Dee]] |- | 1990 | [[Etta James]] |- | 1992 | [[The Four Tops]]<br />[[The O'Jays]]<br />[[The Temptations]]<br />[[The Dells]] |- | 1993 | [[Carmen McCrea]]<br />[[Jerry Butler (singer)|Jerry Butler]] |- | 1994 | [[Earth, Wind and Fire]] |- | 1997 | [[Aretha Franklin]]<br />[[George Clinton (funk musician)|George Clinton]] |- | 1998 | [[Nancy Wilson (singer)|Nancy Wilson]]<br />[[The Isley Brothers]] |- | 1999 | [[Kathleen Battle]] |- | 2001 | [[Sidney Poitier]] |- | 2002 | [[Little Richard]] |- | 2003 | [[Spike Lee]] |- | 2004 | [[Ray Charles]] |- | 2005 | [[Oprah Winfrey]] |- | 2006 | [[Carlos Santana]] |- | 2007 | [[Bill Cosby]] |- | 2008 | [[Stevie Wonder]] |- |} {{NAACP Image Awards}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Naacp Image Award - Hall Of Fame Award}} [[Category:NAACP Image Awards]]
